promptStructure.title: Text-to-Video with Veo 3.1
promptStructure.quote: Medium shot of [subject] in [environment], [clear action] over 8 seconds. Camera [movement], 16:9 at 1080p, cinematic look with [lighting and color]. Audio: [ambience] + [music/VO cue], no subtitles.
promptStructure.description: Write prompts like a concise director’s note: cinematography, subject, action, context, style, audio, format and duration.
steps: Cinematography and framing (medium, wide, macro, tracking)
Audio cues (ambience, music, VO) and “no subtitles” if desired

tips.title: Tips & limits
items: Use framing presets and motion cues to keep Veo predictable
Leverage native audio for first-pass sound; toggle off for cheap silent drafts
Keep sequences focused (2–3 beats) and reuse references for identity
Extend strong shots for longer arcs; stitch clips in your editor
Avoid tiny UI/text; overlay critical copy in post

prompts.title: Cinematic product hero (16:9, 1080p, audio on)
prompts.prompt: 8s hero shot of a premium product on a tabletop, slow dolly, branded grade, clean sonic logo on the final frame.

prompts.title: Wireless earbuds micro-story
prompts.prompt: Shot 1 (0–3 s): macro close-up of one earbud rotating on a wooden desk, shallow depth, warm lamp glow. Shot 2 (3–6 s): medium shot of a professional putting the earbuds in before stepping onto a city street, soft bokeh. Shot 3 (6–8 s): close-up of the charging case clicking shut near a laptop, soft logo reflection. Camera: smooth dollies, handheld feel. Lighting: warm interior → cool street. Audio: city ambience + soft electronic bed + VO: “Block the noise, keep the focus.” No subtitles. Negative: no brands, no on-screen text, no extreme wides.

promptingGlobalPrinciples: Use visual anchors (specific nouns > vague adjectives)
Iterate: change one thing at a time

promptingTabs.label: Quick
promptingTabs.title: Quick prompt (fast iteration)
promptingTabs.description: Use 1–2 sentences when you want variations.

promptingTabs.label: Structured
promptingTabs.title: Structured prompt (best for reliable results)
promptingTabs.description: Separate information so the model can follow it consistently.
promptingTabs.copy:
Subject:
[Who/what + 1 clear action or pose.]

Setting:
[Where + time of day + 2–3 visual anchors.]

Composition:
- Framing: [wide / medium / close-up]
- Angle: [eye-level / low / high]
- Lens feel: [e.g., 35mm natural, shallow DOF]

Lighting + palette:
[Key light + 2–3 palette anchors]

Style constraints:
No logos. No readable text. Clean background.

promptingTabs.label: Pro
promptingTabs.title: Pro prompt (ultra-specific "studio brief")
promptingTabs.description: Use this when you need a very specific look or continuity across shots.
promptingTabs.copy:
Project / intent:
[One-line goal for the still.]

Subject:
[Who/what + wardrobe/materials + 2–3 distinctive traits.]

Location / set:
[Where + time of day + weather. Add 3 visual anchors.]

Composition:
- Framing + angle
- Lens feel + depth of field
- Look: [clean digital / subtle film grain / soft bloom]

Lighting & grade:
- Key light
- Contrast
- Palette anchors (3–5)

Constraints:
No logos. No readable text. No overlays.
